headline: Ecolab Life Sciences Introduces Klercide™ Rapid Sporicide for Cleanroom Applications
summary: ST. PAUL, Minn., October 29, 2025--Ecolab Life Sciences today announced the launch of its Klercide™ Rapid Sporicide, a new sporicidal disinfectant designed to elevate pharmaceutical cleanroom safety and performance, while reducing overall production turnover time. This new pharma cleanroom product is milder on equipment and surfaces and helps improve user experience along with work conditions.

headline: How Ecolab’s (ECL) Strong Q3 and OVIVO Deal Could Reshape Its Hi-Tech Growth Story
summary: Ecolab Inc. recently reported third-quarter 2025 results, with revenue reaching US$4.17 billion, up from US$4.0 billion a year ago, and reaffirmed its robust growth outlook into 2026, anchored by double-digit earnings growth and margin expansion in core segments like Life Sciences and Digital. An important insight from the announcement is the emphasis on innovation and the pending OVIVO acquisition, which is expected to significantly expand Ecolab’s presence in microelectronics and data...
